thread.title: Anthony Jones

author: Anthony Jones
title: Anthony Jones
text: As this was my. First time to make anything I really didn't know that or how to do the whole process so once I finished my design I sent it to the studio and my experience with and the result is even better I love my pants in touch and I'll totally fast quality products and cooperative Had amazing collaborative communication requiring minimal if any alterations to be honest because what I imagined is exactly what was produced.
